# [Interview #428: BarnesandNoble.com Book Club Q&A with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #47](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=428#47)

#### Nightfire

I almost forgot, now that
*The Way of Kings*
first book, first draft is finished, when can we expect that to hit the shelves?

#### Brandon Sanderson

August or September of next year. (Huzzah!)
